events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your credentials shortly.
Your application for the software engineer role has been categorized under Engineering. We are proceeding with the review process.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be reaching out soon for next steps.
The initial screening interview was successfully completed. The recruiter confirmed your skills align well with the role.
We received your prompt and enthusiastic response to the initial screening feedback, showing strong interest in proceeding.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th. We look forward to assessing your engineering skills further.
The technical interview was completed successfully with positive feedback on your problem-solving and coding abilities.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th to discuss company culture, benefits, and your potential fit.
Your HR interview went very well. The team appreciated your communication style and alignment with our values.
We have extended a formal offer for the software engineer position, outlining compensation, benefits, and other employment terms.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
Congratulations! Your acceptance of the offer has been confirmed. We are excited to have you onboard as a software engineer.
Your onboarding process has officially started. Welcome to the team! We have scheduled your orientation and training sessions.
The recruitment case is now closed successfully. You are officially hired and all processes have been completed smoothly.
